blog.name: mcu-incorrect-quotes
blog.title: just for fun
blog.description:
.They didn't said these things... or did they?
Just another blog of incorrect quotes for the marvel cinematic universe. 
Feel free to request or send something.

title:
Show
          Chapter
        |
        Archive of Our Own
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Title: Love and Other Drugs

Chapter 4: Withdrawl’s a Hell of a Drug

Rating: Mature

Characters: Bruce Banner, Tony Stark, Samuel Sterns, Natasha Romanov, Clint Barton

Relationships: Bruce Banner/Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark (Past)

Status: 4/7

Words: 16,564

Summary:

“‘I’m weird about people touching the reactor,’ he blurted out. He chewed his lip, crossing his arms over his chest to hide the way his fingers twitched with that admission.

Bruce blinked, his body unfolding slightly. 'I don’t think that’s weird. That’s your heart, Tony. You shouldn’t let just anybody touch it.’

Tony’s brows rose at the sentiment. They rose even further when Bruce began to blush lightly after the fact.’

Sorry. That was…sorry. I’m one to talk, I guess.’ He made a vague hand gesture. 'Maybe I’m projecting, I don’t know.'”

Tony and Bruce are able to enjoy each other’s company for the first time since Bruce left New York. There’s a mysterious gamma pulse that needs tracking, and SHIELD suspects Sterns is behind it. Stuck together in the middle of nowhere, they make the best of things, indulging in each other’s poisons and exploring the chemistry between them. Things take a turn for the worse when it becomes apparent there’s something wrong with Bruce, and Tony is left wondering if he’s about to lose him before he really had him at all.

summary: 5 times Tony Stark wore something ridiculous + one time everyone else did too
title: 5 times Tony Stark wore something ridiculous + one time everyone else did too
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Gs5yAT

by Aurum18

As much as Tony loves to prance about in his designer suits and band t shirts he also doesn’t care what he wears and everyone else is left wondering how Tony Stark looks ridiculously fashionable and hot in basically anything. At all.

Words: 2657, Chapters: 2/6, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Stephen Strange, Scott Lang, Wade Wilson, Cassie Lang, Bruce Banner, Pepper Potts
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Tony Stark & Avengers Team, Cassie Lang & Tony Stark, Cassie Lang & Scott Lang, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Bruce Banner & Tony Stark, Bruce Banner/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark Does What He Wants, Tony Stark-centric, Minor Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, like as in Steve has a crush and I would put one sided but you never know…, Deadpool being Deadpool, Breaking the Fourth Wall, Wade Wilson Breaking the Fourth Wall, Monster of the Week, Slime, Pop Culture, Snarky Tony Stark, Sassy, Science Bros, Some relationships in tags are just hinted at and mainly just attraction, pepperony is the main ship, Post infinity war- as in the technology but no mentions really of what happened, basically just assume they won and it wasn’t overly traumatic, so really it’s post endgame but endgame hasn’t happened yet, so everyone lives yay

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Pour One Out for Oppy
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2V2bNi8

by WhimsicalEthnographies

But Peter was only three when Spirit and Opportunity landed on Mars. He was seven when Spirit got stuck in a pile of sand (Tony was thirty-nine, and palladium had just begun to poison his blood), and eight the last time NASA received a communication. He was almost eleven when Curiosity landed. And he was sixteen-slash-twenty when he finally had enough energy to sit up in his large bed in the compound and drag a StarkPad into his lap. Tony had almost thrown up all over his own tablet when the holographic image of mars.nasa.gov appeared in the air in front of his too pale, too exhausted kid.

Words: 3297, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 17 of Up Came the Sun

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Precious Peter Parker, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Tony Stark is a good (kind of) Dad, Light Angst, Fluff, opportunity, i’m sad about oppy, peter thinks robots are people, so does tony


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2V2bNi8

blog.description: My name (and not my favorite color) is Red. I'm a guy. This tumblr of mine is primarily for fannish things or esoteric amusements. Occasionally something serious or thought provoking might creep in, and that's fine by me. I like to think I'm a nice sort of bloke. I take people as they are. If you want to be friends, cool, let's be friends.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Born to be mine
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GuzKLW

by CherryPie0

Tony knows that the divorce has been really hard on his sister, so he agrees almost immediately when she asks him to look after Peter for a whole month while she’s on vacation with her new boyfriend. Still, he’s not sure what to expect; he hasn’t seen the kid in years.

He’s definitely not ready for this sweet, precious thing to enter his life and make him feel things that he knows very well he shouldn’t.

Words: 1985, Chapters: 1/5, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Underage
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, Uncle/Nephew Incest, Age Difference, Fluff, Smut, Sharing a Bed, Cuddling & Snuggling, Masturbation, Other Additional Tags to Be Added


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GuzKLW

reblog.comment:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GuzKLW

by CherryPie0

Tony knows that the divorce has been really hard on his sister, so he agrees almost immediately when she asks him to look after Peter for a whole month while she’s on vacation with her new boyfriend. Still, he’s not sure what to expect; he hasn’t seen the kid in years.

He’s definitely not ready for this sweet, precious thing to enter his life and make him feel things that he knows very well he shouldn’t.
